metadata.title: CVE-2022-29900 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Mis-trained branch predictions for return instructions may allow arbitraryspeculative code execution under certain microarchitecture-dependentconditions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29900` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1060-dell300x - 4.15.0-1060.65
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1127-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1127.135
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1145-snapdragon - 4.15.0-1145.155
No subscription required
